General.Name: Sepeda Bersama Indonesia Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Sepeda Bersama Indonesia Tbk engages in the trading of bicycles in Indonesia. It holds Genio Bike brand; and distributes United Bike and Avand brand bicycles. The company was founded in 2017 and is headquartered in South Tangerang, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. Boulevard Alam Sutera No. 12A, South Tangerang, Indonesia, 15325
